readable.title: 3030566410_393c36a6c5
readable.content: A child , held by his mother , slides down a water slide . A woman holding a young boy slide down a water slide into a pool . A woman is holding up a child as they coming splashing down a slide into a pool . A woman is sliding down a water slide with a little boy on her lap . A woman slides down a purple water slide with a small boy on her lap into a pool .
